name: Aqua Moto Racing Utopia
overview: Experience high speed and nerve-wrecking tension in a world of pure fun racing with powerful watercraft on waves so state-of-the-art you need to feel them to believe them. Explore and discover secret passages in dreamlike exotic locations like the Amazon, Tropics, Greece, and the Mangrove swamplands. Landing that perfect stunt in a narrow canal will surely put a smile on your face!
